name: Pitar Petrick
reviews: It is a great Monitor. However, it will be greater adding seen Movie and Music. Thank you for the amazing Monitor.

name: John Wick
reviews: This monitor was purchased 8/1/21 to use while working from home 2 days a week. The monitor was received & setup on 8/5 & began using on 8/6. Worked great! Perfect size for my needs & the quality was good.

name: Robert Bruce
reviews: I bought this Prechen 19” monitor to replace my 7 years old monitor that give up on us, it was the one attached to our security cameras system, so we needed another one of similar quality. I was drastically mistaken.

name: Bruce Lee
reviews: This is My opinion About this productIt is a great. However, it will be greater when i seen  movie and music. Thank you for the amazing Monitor.

name: Robert Frek
reviews: This monitor is a good value at its price point. My teenage daughter wanted a computer. I didn't want to spend a lot on a monitor for her because she's mostly going to use to play Minecraft.

name: Jack Ma
reviews: I bought this computer screen to go with a mini PC that I purchased recently. I did a lot of research on what was the best screen for my money and this one came out on top in quality for price.

name: Anil Khanna
reviews: This is a high quality monitor. There are certainly better out there, but this is just a really good monitor. The end user is very happy. Due to crazy market prices, at the time of this purchase

name: Mr. Obocama
reviews: This is MUCH smaller than a 27 inch curved monitor that I bought a few weeks ago setup was easy, but it's TINY!

name: Samuel Jack
reviews: Gave it two stars because it has no camera or speaker. Guess I should’ve had my husband order it. What a look of disappointment on his face when he said I chose this on
